name: Jennifer's Nightmare
description:
Jennifer gets caught in a downpour while walking through unfamiliar woods. She happens upon a cabin to escape the rain and takes a nap inside. When she wakes up she finds herself in the middle of a nightmare. What dangers will she face trying to escape these horrors?

Jennifer's Nightmare is a supplemental game to Jennifer's Quest and was made for the Halloween season. It dives deeper into the character of Jennifer as she tries to reclaim her memories.
